title: Systematic DOJ weaponization and political interference - TTT Article 123
description:
Research systematic corruption pattern: DOJ weaponization and political interference

SOURCE: Trump Tyranny Tracker Article 123
TITLE: Trump Tyranny Tracker: Day 24
URL: https://trumptyrannytracker.substack.com/p/trump-tyranny-tracker-day-24

CORRUPTION PATTERN ANALYSIS:
This research priority focuses on documenting the systematic nature of doj weaponization and political interference, 
moving beyond isolated incidents to reveal coordinated campaigns and institutional capture mechanisms.

KEY RESEARCH QUESTIONS:
- Which specific prosecutors were installed or removed for political reasons?
- What cases were opened or closed for partisan purposes?
- How was the Attorney General's office coordinating political prosecutions?
- Which DOJ career attorneys resigned in protest and when?
- What coordination existed with state-level prosecutors?
- How were investigations into political opponents initiated and managed?

TIMELINE FOCUS:
- Document specific dates and coordination meetings
- Identify key actors and their systematic roles
- Map institutional capture progression
- Track resistance and countermeasures
- Connect to broader kleptocratic patterns

INDICATORS FROM SOURCE:
- Potential dates: 2025
- Key actors mentioned: To be researched
